import React from 'react' import aplace from '../../assets/img/aplace.png' import stuternhim from '../../assets/img/stuternheim.png' import chimie from '../../assets/img/chimie.png' import sandqvist from '../../assets/img/sand.png' import hope from '../../assets/img/hopeWhite.png' import kotn from '../../assets/img/kotnWhite.png' import { useRef } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' export default function ResponsiveDefilementBar() { const refBar = useRef(); const bar = useRef(); useEffect(() => {; bar.current.style.transform ="translateY(0%)"; }, []) return (

) }
